segments.text: I see two children involved in some secret activity on the left side of the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A boy is balanced on a wobbly-looking two-step stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching high into an open upper cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can clearly see the "COOKIE JAR" inside the cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His hand is deep in the jar, pulling out goodies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks incredibly unstable; it's practically tipping backward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm really worried he's going to fall off that thing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister is standing below, eagerly looking up with her hand outstretched.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's definitely waiting for her share of the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I find it somewhat amusing how coordinated their secret operation is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But this is completely unsafe behavior, climbing like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They are so engrossed that they are oblivious to any other danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm surprised the woman hasn't heard them yet, or felt the shaking.
segments.speaker: PAR
